sentences.sentence: The quadriceps muscle brings your knee into full extension.
sentences.translation: 四头肌肌肉让你的膝进入完全的延长。

sentences.sentence: Engage your quadriceps (front muscle on thigh) and extend your torso until you can melt over your legs.
sentences.translation: 使用你的四头肌(前面的大腿肌肉)并延长你的躯干直到你能够将你的腿弄软。

sentences.sentence: When an MRI revealed that I'd torn 90 percent of my right quadriceps, I was flown back to Washington.
sentences.translation: 核磁共振成像显示，我90%的右侧四头肌撕裂，于是我被飞机送回华盛顿。
